message: Let's start with a fair split. You can try to do better in the next round if you want.
I think I can do better than that. Your turn to decide.
You were too generous last round, I'm taking a bit more this time. Your turn!
You're taking too much. I'll give you a bit more, but not that much.
I'm not getting any younger, and inflation isn't helping. You'd better make a better offer next time!
I'm not giving up yet. You're not getting away with this!
This is my last offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to negotiate further.
You said it was your last offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll make one final counteroffer.
